A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The most unnecessarily controversial movie I've ever seen. Yes\, the casino plot was unnecessary\, but all the Rey/Kylo stuff was great\, and the Luke outrage is insane. A man who was taught and mentored by Yoda and Obi-Wan\, who both made a sizeable mistake and went into hiding for years\, would make a sizeable mistake and go into hiding for years\, and that's out of character? Give me a break. Rian Johnson is brilliant\, as always. It's not perfect\, but anyone saying it \"ruined Star Wars\" needs to grow up.
